Text:
Thanks mate!
Can I hope for the remixed Street Legal too? The original CBS CD-release really had crappy sound ...

Street Legal's coming up. The reissues I dont have is John Wesley Harding (but the remix is supposed to suck), Desire, Slow Train Coming, Infidels and Love & Theft. I hope to get them at the library, in time...

Oh, and i dont have the remix of Another Side of BD.

About the CBS release of Street Legal: wasnt the original record not even mixed when it was release? I seem to remember something like that....
it downloaded as real media for me
B. nice if you told us the encoding rate??
Its hard to recall how good the original was after listening to this crap!!! Decent bitrate please...this music deserves it!!
